title: I Wanna Be Yours
author: Arctic Monkeys
lyrics:
[00:18.02] I wanna be your vacuum cleaner
[00:21.89] Breathing in your dust
[00:25.03] I wanna be your Ford Cortina
[00:28.75] I will never rust
[00:32.44] If you like your coffee hot
[00:36.08] Let me be your coffee pot
[00:39.43] You call the shots, babe
[00:42.32] I just wanna be yours
[00:46.24] Secrets I have held in my heart
[00:50.00] Are harder to hide than I thought
[00:53.38] Maybe I just wanna be yours
[00:56.77] I wanna be yours, I wanna be yours
[01:02.32] Wanna be yours
[01:05.93] Wanna be yours
[01:09.42] Wanna be yours
[01:14.81] Let me be your leccy meter
[01:18.69] And I'll never run out
[01:21.31] Let me be the portable heater
[01:25.43] That you'll get cold without
[01:28.97] I wanna be your setting lotion (wanna be)
[01:32.75] Hold your hair in deep devotion (I'll be)
[01:36.22] At least as deep as the Pacific Ocean
[01:39.42] Now I wanna be yours
[01:43.18] Secrets I have held in my heart
[01:46.69] Are harder to hide than I thought
[01:50.30] Maybe I just wanna be yours
[01:53.53] I wanna be yours, I wanna be yours
[01:59.26] Wanna be yours
[02:02.56] Wanna be yours
[02:06.19] Wanna be yours
[02:09.72] Wanna be yours
[02:13.38] Wanna be yours
[02:16.79] Wanna be yours
[02:20.36] Wanna be yours
[02:24.13] (Wanna be yours)
[02:25.94] I wanna be your vacuum cleaner (wanna be yours)
[02:29.84] Breathing in your dust (wanna be yours)
[02:32.97] I wanna be your Ford Cortina (wanna be yours)
[02:36.85] I will never rust (wanna be yours)
[02:39.70] I just wanna be yours (wanna be yours)
[02:42.99] I just wanna be yours (wanna be yours)
[02:46.63] I just wanna be yours (wanna be yours)
[02:49.70]
